purpose: Physical bootstrap configuration. This file is allowed to use physical paths because it runs before DOC_ID resolution is available.

inspect.goal: Validate DOC_ID universe and reference integrity using DOC_VOCAB.

activated.goal: Deterministic activated processing without discovery; reading scope is constrained by ENTRYPOINT + profile + DOC_SET.

constraints.allowed_physical_relpath_format: POSIX repo-root-relative; no leading slash; no '..' segments

notes: DOC_ID and filename have no naming relationship requirement (as defined in 2PLT_05_DOC_ID_VOCAB).
This BOOT LOADER does not define DOC_IDs. It only provides physical bootstrap paths and resolution rules.
Commit pinning should be supplied externally via override_ref_param, not hardcoded here.
